title: I got 14 day suspension when I just literally spent this whole year trying to get to plat....
body: pretty much i just got to plat at the end of this season, just yesterday on 11/11/18 for the first time since season 3...... i worked really un explainably hard to get there..... and apparently people reported me on an ARAM that i played with my stepbro that i lost because i died a lot or didn't "try hard", though I did try and i tried to win.... and the other game was actually on a ranked game where i panic picked jinx because I don't play adc very much and the adc's I did play I wasn't comfortable playing against draven so i tried to pick jinx which i thought might've been good, but it was horrible and i went 0/8 and i didn't even get to pick the runes that i wanted in time because my team was harrassing & "trade spamming" in champ select that i had smite still cause I rarely get any other role besides jg and that pressure was immense and i didn't even get to change my runes or change smite to heal, (by the way when i queue jg with a different ss it automatically changes to smite).... so pretty much i tried also in that game, but was especially out classed and i tried to push back and do my best but i was not feeding and didn't try to lose, there was literally nothing i could do at that point and i was doing my best.... I just want to know if somehow people can see this or if a rioter can help me please because i feel extremely harassed and this I believe this is completely undeserved....... like i literally want to cry..... I may have said something in those game like "this one is over" or "i was autofilled"(because that's truly how i feel in any role besides jg but adc is my best secondary...) or "i'm sorry" I know I told the guys/girls i was sorry in the ranked game for sure..... the ARAM i don't know what happened but i know that I am just morally milked man, I can't do enough right things to make everyone happy, can i please just make riot happy enough to un suspend my account so i can earn what i literally spent all season working towards just to long in today for this.... I've literally tried so hard to be good, and I can't control the people that aren't.... I do nothing but try to morally support people, and i'm just left morally milked.... i'm not even trying to be anything but genuine.... please can this be fixed ;-;

replies.body: That's sounds very unfun and unfortunate! The best thing to do is to ignore everything everyone else is saying 99% of the time, like mentally putting blinders on in the place of what others are saying in chat so you are able to stay calm and focused! Just send a ticket to Riot Support to see what they can do for you! :)

I really hope it can be fixed.... I worked so unbelievably hard to get there... like i'm just as a loss for words and am in emotional disgust... some people are really heartless on this game, and i'm not one of them....
It's 14 days and you keep your rank. Chill

> [{quoted}](name=Morally Milked,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bZ3YUw7W,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-13T04:57:33.927+0000)
>
> pretty much i just got to plat at the end of this season, just yesterday on 11/11/18 for the first time since season 3...... i worked really un explainably hard to get there..... and apparently people reported me on an ARAM that i played with my stepbro that i lost because i died a lot or didn't "try hard", though I did try and i tried to win.... and the other game was actually on a ranked game where i panic picked jinx because I don't play adc very much and the adc's I did play I wasn't comfortable playing against draven so i tried to pick jinx which i thought might've been good, but it was horrible and i went 0/8 and i didn't even get to pick the runes that i wanted in time because my team was harrassing & "trade spamming" in champ select that i had smite still cause I rarely get any other role besides jg and that pressure was immense and i didn't even get to change my runes or change smite to heal, (by the way when i queue jg with a different ss it automatically changes to smite).... so pretty much i tried also in that game, but was especially out classed and i tried to push back and do my best but i was not feeding and didn't try to lose, there was literally nothing i could do at that point and i was doing my best.... I just want to know if somehow people can see this or if a rioter can help me please because i feel extremely harassed and this I believe this is completely undeserved....... like i literally want to cry..... I may have said something in those game like "this one is over" or "i was autofilled"(because that's truly how i feel in any role besides jg but adc is my best secondary...) or "i'm sorry" I know I told the guys/girls i was sorry in the ranked game for sure..... the ARAM i don't know what happened but i know that I am just morally milked man, I can't do enough right things to make everyone happy, can i please just make riot happy enough to un suspend my account so i can earn what i literally spent all season working towards just to long in today for this.... I've literally tried so hard to be good, and I can't control the people that aren't.... I do nothing but try to morally support people, and i'm just left morally milked.... i'm not even trying to be anything but genuine.... please can this be fixed ;-;

The IFS doesn't care about your feelings and doesn't care about anything except you "conforming" to the "system" and basically being a perfect human being, and NEVER, EVER, EVER talking in chat, except to say "good job", "gj", "gl hf" and "gg wp" and NOTHING ELSE.  EVER.

Anything else you say can and will be used against you by an inhuman, uncaring bot, and you need to accept that.  It's not your fault.  It's the fault of the heartless employees who developed this system and thought they were doing something good.  They don't care about casualties and victims falling through, yet they claim they do.

Your best bet is to file a support ticket and ask politely for them to reverse the ban.  Most likely they won't.

It always tears my heart up to hear stories like this, but this is the current state of the game.  It's dying.  It's losing players fast, only driven by the esports marketing machine and profits, and all the money from tencent games.

I suggest you just find a different game to play, a game run and managed by HUMAN beings that understand context and compassion.  League is just for streamers now, washed out pros, and angry, depressed mentally ill kids and young adults. (Why do you think saying "Kys" is an instant 14 day ban? because Riot KNOWS most gamers are depressed and unable to cope with real life problems so they bring it into League).

Feel free to add me on Discord or Steam.  Post your discord here in a reply (or your steam) and I'll add you.  There are some nice games coming out.  Building a new rig for Battlefield 5 (my high end laptop can already run it but my desktop is a joke.  My i9 9900K arrives tomorrow).  BTW if you're not in highschool or older, don't contact me.  I don't want to deal with young kids anymore, no offense.

>and basically being a perfect human being, and NEVER, EVER, EVER talking in chat, except to say "good job", "gj", "gl hf" and "gg wp" and NOTHING ELSE. EVER.

False

Ive never had an issue talking in chat

the only people who find issues are the flamers who can't contain their egos. if you are such a person then, yes, <<"good job", "gj", "gl hf" and "gg wp" and NOTHING ELSE. EVER. >> might just be the best fit for you

Couldn't have said it better myself.  I just got a 14 day ban for saying.... f a g.....one match, 30 seconds of convo at the very end of a meaningless ARAM, no warnings, just ban.  SO DUCKING STUPID.   DUCK YOU RIOT.  Please report this btw, I want this account banned. thanks!

I have personally had many great experiences with support, so that's probably the best way to go.  Unfortunately those guys are always going to be around, but I'm sorry to hear about that.  As long as you weren't flaming or being overly toxic I see no reason why you couldn't make a good case (and why they shouldn't have at least a warning fir acting that way).
Don't worry about it bud you're not missing much. People will only have their new border for 3 months this season then it gets turned into armor. Im pretty sure you get that in the pre season.

Honestly, m'lad, just mute everyone in chat, focus on your own game and don't worry about it. As long as you understand where your champ does well during the game, you're good. Talk to Rito about it bc a 14 day ban seems a tad extreme for an ARAM report and an auto filled ranked game. Hopefully season 9 is better to you! Good luck!

Two things:
1.  If you ever get in a situation where you feel like your team is being toxic in champ select or you can't change runes/summs fast enough just dodge.  Small xp loss and you avoid all of this.
2. If other people talking to you makes you tilt or hurts you in game /mute all.  You will play better without people harassing you and you probably know what to do in game since you're plat.  If your team isnt encouraging then you don't need to listen to what they have to say. 
 If you made plat this season I have faith you can do it again next season and I'm rooting for you!
I spent 15 minutes roasting someone with no ban, what is this system?
TIL "....." is an acceptable substitute for formatting and punctuation.

This really sucks and shows just what is wrong with league. I wish you the best of luck with getting unbanned if you didn't deserve to be. I refuse to play ranked ever again because of crap like this. Riot should make summoner's rift ranked and custom only and remove normals entirely. Also, there shouldn't be any skin for ranked rewards. Your border should be plenty enough. The game is dying because Riot refuses to make other game modes just as viable for casual players. We don't all want to play ranked or be forced to fit the esports mold. Let the toxic kids with egos play in their ranked cesspool and let the rest of us have fun.
This exactly.  How about a mode where people can say whatever the fuck they want?  Where's the harm in that?

Yeah contact riot support, getting banned off one bad ARAM game and a ranked game that was autofilled with wrong runes and SS is really weird and either it was a mistake or a buildup of strikes leading up to it (extremely unlikely), hopefully you get your account unbanned and recieve your ranked rewards

I don't see any especially bad ARAM matches in your match history (Singed match 5 days ago was worst and it looks perfectly understandable to me), and since you didn't get chat logs with the punishment, I suggest you contact Riot Support (link at the top of this page) and try to solve the situation that way.

I would try to ask Riot support if you do truly believe your ban was undeserving.  You seem genuine though.  I hope you figure this stuff out.  
Btw you might want message them several times after the first response, it depends on which Rioter you get
I will try.... I'm still waiting on a response from someone real... I hope so too... I'm just really depressed.... thank you... i am genuine...
they are not going to give you your season rewards.... even though we all know they can if they really wanted to

> [{quoted}](name=Morally Milked,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bZ3YUw7W,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2018-11-13T07:29:27.532+0000)
>
> I will try.... I'm still waiting on a response from someone real... I hope so too... I'm just really depressed.... thank you... i am genuine...

What's your discord or steam ?

Stuff like this is why I stop playing game, You can grind in ranked and go in a normal match and hey guess what there is a random 4 man on your team and they all mass report you and you just get triggered by the system.

yeahhhhh except thats not how the system works...

at all

It's actually rare to be banned for intentional feeding, since it is not easily spotted in the first place. If you insist enough and if you really didn't int, you may a have a review by the support and eventually get unbanned. I really feel bad for you :(
By the way, if you really feel uncomfortable by getting Auto filled, just Dodge the game (after trying to switch roles).

I know the feeling bruh,same here. I have received 6 permabans (2 for flaming,1 for "unallowed party programs" and other 3 for "griefing")
yet i know that i wont receive rewards probably ever.. Im probably on edge now cause i think that next ban is gonna be last (ID) so am trying to be "better"even tho rewards are the only thing probably that encourages me to play . System is just on another level of stupidity controlled by clowns,. Meta is killing this game every single new patch by making tanks gods and morphing assassins into "REAPERS". Its sad how no one in that company can actually fix this game because,for every good change they make,they screw another,and thats a vicious circle that is gonna be repeated as long as there are "School Dropouts" and Clowns there. FeelsBadMan tho. I just think that reforming in this game is not worth it,cause it will take u 1/3 season (or 1/3 year,or even more) to make drastic progress in honor (it is possible to do it in 1 or 2 months but mehhh).

Riot game have problems on ban player the whole time, you could get ban for telling teammates how to work and sometimes you get mad and type "fk-ing" they ban you. I had 8 account banned because feeding or unskilled teammates reported me for flaming, riot can never explain what is the definition of flaming and they don't ban how player behalf during the game they only ban player base on what they said. That is something very strange, basically is telling you" you suck you feed you are bad you are trolling is all good but you can't talk." They will tell you to ignore those player but how can you ignore when they starting to harass you ?

yeah.
sorry bout that.
but for real, you should have just control yourself, not becuase of Riot, I told most of my toxic voice chat friends to unplug their enter key from their key board.

chat logs if any?

there isn't any... and yeah most of the time i don't even say anything unless i'm in a good place and the people are decent.. but these people were animals and all I did was briefly explain my situation and apologize and I just feel like i got virtually jumped...

Yeah, its best not to talk, but you make a fair point.
Jumped is a little harsh, you wern't mentally damaged in anyway.

you are kidding... i am very mentally damaged by this... after submitting the ticket the the support bot said i was suspended for "intentionally feeding" which i did not even come close to doing.... i may have died a lot but i wasn't dieing on purpose or "griefing" by any means.... i literally have explained my situation and even did briefly in-game too my "teammates" that were harassing me and telling the enemy team to ban me.... i tried to play but they weren't playing with me... i can't even do anything about it either, i'm trying but nothing is happening and i don't even think riot cares at all...

> [{quoted}](name=Morally Milked,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=bZ3YUw7W,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T07:25:17.239+0000)
>
> you are kidding... i am very mentally damaged by this... after submitting the ticket the the support bot said i was suspended for "intentionally feeding" which i did not even come close to doing.... i may have died a lot but i wasn't dieing on purpose or "griefing" by any means.... i literally have explained my situation and even did briefly in-game too my "teammates" that were harassing me and telling the enemy team to ban me.... i tried to play but they weren't playing with me... i can't even do anything about it either, i'm trying but nothing is happening and i don't even think riot cares at all...

Just keep reaching out till you get an actual person
post the chatlogs if theres any will help your case
it doesn't have any :/

listen kid, it's just season rewards and it's not that good. Don't be so over dramatic saying you are mentally damaged from this. It's only a game.  I would find that pretty offensive to the people who've actually suffer from depression and mental abuse. If you really cant handle flame from a few games (which is very often in league now) i recommend you switch to a more positive community. It is your own loss, and i wouldn't blame your teammates for being mad when you "went 0/8", i don't see how that's not feeding. whether they were trade spamming or not you still have lots of time to decide. If you honestly want to make it to plat you should get comfortable with more than 1 role.  sure "im sorry" is a good thing but it doesn't help. Just mute or don't bother reading chat. You shouldn't have even bothered to reply to anything. If you didn't and you didn't go 0/8 i would believe that your ban is undeserved. Don't blame riot for everything, it's the community to.

i have tourette's syndrome and diagnosed on autism spectrum for asperger's syndrome, you don't know what i go through with depression and abuse not only from other people growing up and my own mental abuse and confidence issues and trust issues.... i am "aspie honest" and i have nothing but good intentions in anything i say or do, i can't live with evil or the guilt of using/abusing anyone or anything to get my way. I can handle flame, I do very maturely in most instances, especially this one.... I am 23 years old and you have no reason to be so negative towards me I was not negative towards you, and I don't hurt peoples feelings on purpose, I didn't blame anyone for anything, I was just trying to explain my situation the best I could.. your negativity won't get you far. I'm already above it, kid.
Please use paragraphs, sentence punctuation, and the Enter Key.... This Wall of  Text is giving me eye cancer...
Stop crying I got my main account permanentpy banned for sarcasm and u don't see me crying.

This was the funniest thing I’ve ever read. I can’t wait to see this guys reaction when he gets perma banned if ever. I’ve had 3 perma banned accounts and on 2 of those I’ve had every single champion at the time of the ban (120 champs or so. Probably more) as well as both of the accounts were mid platinum at the time the third was a gold 2 at the time of the ban and decayed all the way to silver 1 by the end of season 2 years ago. You still get the skin kid. Don’t start crying. You still get the borders. You just don’t get the chromas for the victorious skin which lets face it. It’s orianna. When are you ever going to play her as a “jungle main”
